DOC.brief_summary: Anesthesia induction with sevoflurane is not associated with an increased incidence or severity of laryngeal injuries compared with an anesthesia induction with a muscle relaxant.
DOC.brief_title: Laryngeal Injuries After Anesthesia Induction With Sevoflurane and After Anesthesia Induction With Rocuronium
